meanings.definition: A type of spicy sausage typically used as a pizza topping.
meanings.sent1: I love the smell of pepperonis on my pizza.
meanings.sent2: The pepperonis on the pizza were perfectly crispy.
meanings.sent3: The pepperonis on the pizza danced around like little red circles.
meanings.sent4: The pepperonis on the pizza were like spicy jewels scattered on a golden crust.
meanings.sent5: The pepperonis sizzled and released their delicious aroma as they cooked.
